message.content:
cs.LG, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.NI, cs.SE

Reasoning: 
1. cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper discusses the use of Edge computing for training machine learning models, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
2. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing): The paper discusses the distribution of computing power and processing of data on Edge nodes, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
3. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms): The paper discusses the use of checkpointing strategies to save memory, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
4. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture): The paper discusses the reduced power and bandwidth requirements on Edge nodes, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
5. cs.SE (Software Engineering): The paper discusses the implementation of training on the Edge and the advantages of doing so, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
